items.title: Pleated checked wool midi skirt
items.description: A house signature since the '20s, Burberry's skirt is cut from its iconic check in navy, red and white. This weighted wool piece fits slim through the waist before flaring to a pleated A-line shape that fans out as you move. Keep it feeling current with high-shine heels.
details: Concealed hook and zip fastening at side
